# Introducing our new NVMe KVM VPS Line

### RAID-10 backed pure NVMe VPS!


The moment you've been waiting for is here! (or at least the moment I've been waiting for)


We're excited to introduce, our new NVMe line of Virtual Private Servers!


Take advantage of this sale while it lasts! (Coupon is good through Sunday, May 3)


**Promo Code:** _NVMEVPSLAUNCH_ (40% [recurring] off ANY [NVMe VPS](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?gid=32 "NVMe VPS"))
> 
> **[NVMe KVM Nano](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=292 "NVMe KVM Nano")** | 8 GB NVMe | 512 MB DDR4 | 1 vCPU | ~~$6/mo~~ $3.60/mo
> 
> **[NVMe KVM Micro](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=293 "NVMe KVM Micro")** | 16 GB NVMe | 1 GB DDR4 | 1 vCPU | ~~$10/mo~~ $6/mo

All NVMe servers include:
    - 1 TB Premium Bandwidth
    - 1 Gbps+ Port Speed
    - 1 IPv4 Address
    - 1 /64 IPv6 Subnet
